# Documentation

This directory contains key project documentation files.

## Contents

### For Users

- **[CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md)** - Version history and changes
  - Tracks all notable changes to the project
  - Follows [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/) format
  - Organized by version with semantic versioning

### For Contributors

- **[CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md)** - Contributor guidelines
  - How to set up development environment
  - Code style guidelines
  - Testing requirements
  - Pull request process

### For Security

- **[SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md)** - Security policy
  - How to report vulnerabilities
  - Security best practices
  - Supported versions
  - Responsible disclosure policy

### Project Updates

- **[IMPROVEMENTS_APPLIED.md](IMPROVEMENTS_APPLIED.md)** - Recent improvements
  - Summary of recent project enhancements
  - Quality improvements
  - Tooling updates
  - Organizational changes
